short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature with the Koi Pond Bridge Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch as colorful koi fish gracefully swim beneath a tranquil bridge, creating a peaceful atmosphere each time you open a new tab.

Features:
🐟 Dynamic Koi Pond Animation: Enjoy the peaceful movement of koi fish and flowing water.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Easily search the web from your new tab page.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stay up-to-date with the built-in clock and date feature.
📌 Customizable Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites with addable and removable shortcuts.
Why Download?
This calming Chrome extension brings the tranquility of a koi pond to your browser, blending functionality and beauty in every new tab.

Find more nature-themed extensions like Zen Garden, Cherry Blossom Dreams, and Bamboo Forest on our website!
